name: Commandos 3: Destination Berlin
notes:
- Recent GOG installer required (v2 or above).
- Uses the Commandos 2+3 GOG installer but only installs Commandos 3.
- Fix for multiplayer by TCP/IP included.
- The mouse may not be captured well initially, just move it around until the cursor appears and avoid clicking until then. Use the Escape key to skip the intro movies.

files.game: N/A:Select the Windows installer provided by GOG

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Select the Windows installer provided by GOG
game:
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Commandos 2 and 3/Commandos 3/Commandos3.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    app: directplay amstream quartz
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /silent /nogui /components=component1
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
